parameters.name: BeginTs
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: EndTs
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description:
The metric. Valid values:

*   JoinChannelSucRate: the success rate of joining a channel within 5 seconds.
*   VideoStuckRate: the video stuttering rate.
*   AudioStuckRate: the audio stuttering rate.
*   FirstFrameCost: the time to first frame.

parameters.name: Os
parameters.description: The operating system. Valid values: iOS and Android.

parameters.name: TerminalType
parameters.description: The terminal type. Valid values: web and mobile.
